items.title: Mayor Oh Se-hoon emphasizes responsibility amidst political turmoil
items.content: Mayor Oh Se-hoon expressed a 'heavy sense of responsibility' regarding political turmoil, pledging to prioritize citizens' daily lives, including safety and transportation.

items.title: Seoul City takes full responsibility for mobility during bus strike
items.content: In response to the bus strike, Mayor Oh Se-hoon stated Seoul City would take 'grave responsibility', announcing emergency measures like increased subway operations and free shuttle buses.
